From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>

First, I have a dumb question:  what kind of team should I try to
send 
 through the Tyrxian chronicles?  They are so maze fulled that I end 
up having to raise a ghost to save time collecting gold and silver.

2nd, I have noticed that if one sends powerfull enough attacks at a 
door, the door will open automatically WITHOUT using any keys.  Can 
someone at FS Games explains how this little bug works?

3rd, Can someone at FS Games tell me the specific limitations on how 
much strength, dex, con, intelligence, and experience are the
maximum? 
 I want to make sure I do NOT design a level too close to those 
extremes.  I have also noticed that when a level 255 archmage summons 
a fire elemental, the elemental's health and magic power are listed
as 
 negative numbers.  Can someone as FS Games explain this one?

4th, Is not the Archmage un-arguably the best character in the game?  
2nd best, cleric.  3rd best, mage. 4th best, druid. 5th best elf. 
6th 
best ghost; 7th best faire; 8th best skeleton. Will everyone send a 
listing of what they think the top 10 best characters are in order
and 
why they deserve their rank?
